rule.note: Disable Railo Context except for local requests

All the following requests should not be allowed and should return with a 404 We block any request to:
* the application folder (where all the logic and views for your site lives) * the uploads folder (should be configured to be somewhere else anyways) * this url rewrite file! * Application.cfc

rule.name: Add trailing slash to directories without a trailing slash

rule.note: All request to *.html or ending in / will be rewritten to /index.cfm
All request to system static assets that live under /preside/system/assets should go through Railo and will be rewritten to /index.cfm
